body:
Because the print op doesn't have a GPU implementation

On Dec 4, 2017 20:16, "gauss-clb" <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> @alextp <https://github.com/alextp> Could you tell why op = tf.Print(op,
> ['op']) and q = tf.Print(y, [y]) are defined on cpu:0 ?
>
> —
